#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;

int main(){
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		int ans=0;
		for(int a=5;a<=n;a+=5){
			int cnt=0;
			int val=a;
			while(val%5==0){
				val/=5;
				cnt++;
			}
			ans+=a*cnt;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
